author: Staff Reporter
M K
text:
Power

shutdown

In the view of monthly maintenance work to be carried out at the Karanampettai sub-station of Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation on January 5, there will be no power supply from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. to the following areas: Karanampettai, Paruvai, Sangothipalayam, Perumagoundenpalayam, Kadampady, Aero Nagar and part of Kankeyampalayam.
title: Briefly (Three Items)
